title: Research Pipeline Foundation
description:
Establish the foundational documentation and scaffolding for the research paper management system.

## Goal
Create VISION, ARCHITECTURE, and PRDs that define the complete pipeline from paper acquisition through knowledge extraction to paper generation.

## Deliverables
1. VISION.md - Project purpose and success criteria
2. ARCHITECTURE.md - Pipeline stages, components, data flow
3. PRDs for each pipeline stage (Acquisition, Conversion, Extraction, Knowledge Base, Generation)
4. Mage scaffolding with empty targets

## Acceptance Criteria
- All documentation follows format rules in .claude/rules/
- PRDs define clear requirements for each stage
- Mage project compiles with placeholder targets

title: Create VISION.md
description:
## Type
Documentation

## Required Reading

- .claude/rules/documentation-standards.md

## Files to Create
- docs/VISION.md

## Required Sections (per vision-format rule)
1. Executive Summary - What the project is, what it is not
2. Introduction - Research context, the problem, what this does
3. Why This Project - Why build a personal research pipeline
4. Planning and Implementation - Success criteria, what done looks like, phases, risks
5. What This Is NOT - Boundaries (not a paper database, not an LLM, not a citation manager)

## Content Hints
- Problem: Managing research papers end-to-end is fragmented across tools
- Solution: Unified Go/Mage pipeline from acquisition to paper generation
- Success: Can download a paper, extract knowledge, and use it in new writing
- Phases: Foundation (docs), Core Pipeline (acquisition/conversion), Knowledge (extraction/base), Generation

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All required sections present per vision-format
- [ ] Style follows documentation-standards
- [ ] File saved at docs/VISION.md

title: PRD: Paper Acquisition
description:
## Type
Documentation

## Required Reading
- .claude/rules/prd-format.md
- .claude/rules/documentation-standards.md
- docs/ARCHITECTURE.md (after it exists)

## Files to Create
- docs/specs/product-requirements/prd001-acquisition.yaml

## Required Sections (per prd-format rule)
- id: prd001-acquisition
- title: Paper Acquisition
- problem: Multi-line description of fragmented paper downloading
- goals: G1, G2, G3...
- requirements: R1 (Sources), R2 (Organization), R3 (Metadata)
- non_goals: What we are NOT building
- acceptance_criteria: Checkable outcomes

## Content Hints
- Problem: Papers scattered across arXiv, ACM, IEEE, direct URLs; no unified download
- Goals: Single command to fetch papers, automatic metadata extraction, organized storage
- Requirements:
  - R1: Source support (arXiv, DOI, direct URL)
  - R2: Metadata extraction (title, authors, date, abstract)
  - R3: File organization (by topic, date, or custom taxonomy)
  - R4: Idempotent downloads (skip if exists)
  - R5: Progress reporting
- Non-goals: Full-text search (that's Knowledge Base), citation graph (that's Extraction)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All required sections present per prd-format
- [ ] Requirements numbered and specific
- [ ] File saved at docs/specs/product-requirements/prd001-acquisition.yaml

- non_goals: What we are NOT building

## Content Hints
- Problem: PDFs lock content in opaque format; can't search, can't extract, can't process
- Goals: Clean markdown output, preserved structure, linked references
- Requirements:
  - R1: Section preservation (headings, paragraphs)
  - R2: Citation extraction and linking
  - R3: Figure/table handling (placeholders or extraction)
  - R4: Multi-column layout support
  - R5: Scanned PDF handling (OCR fallback)
  - R6: Batch processing with progress
- Non-goals: Perfect formatting (80% good enough), image extraction

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All required sections present per prd-format
- [ ] Requirements numbered and specific

title: Mage Project Scaffolding
description:
## Type
Code

## Required Reading
- docs/ARCHITECTURE.md (after it exists)
- .claude/rules/go-style.md

## Files to Create/Modify
- go.mod (create)
- magefiles/magefile.go (create) - Main Mage entry with placeholder targets
- magefiles/acquire.go (create) - Acquisition target stubs
- magefiles/convert.go (create) - Conversion target stubs
- magefiles/extract.go (create) - Extraction target stubs
- magefiles/knowledge.go (create) - Knowledge base target stubs
- magefiles/generate.go (create) - Generation target stubs

## Requirements
- Initialize Go module with appropriate name
- Create Mage targets matching ARCHITECTURE pipeline stages:
  - mage download - Placeholder for paper acquisition
  - mage convert - Placeholder for PDF conversion
  - mage extract - Placeholder for knowledge extraction
  - mage index - Placeholder for knowledge base indexing
  - mage brainstorm - Placeholder for idea exploration
  - mage draft - Placeholder for content generation
  - mage pipeline - Runs all stages end-to-end
- Each target should print what it will do (not implemented yet)
- Create directory structure: papers/{raw,markdown,metadata}, knowledge/{extracted,index}, output/{drafts,notes}

## Design Decisions
- Use magefiles/ directory (not magefile.go in root) per Mage best practices
- One file per pipeline stage for organization
- Targets return error for consistent error handling

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] go mod init succeeds
- [ ] mage -l lists all targets
- [ ] Each target runs and prints placeholder message
- [ ] Directory structure created
- [ ] Code follows go-style rules
